EmailTemplate.subject: Update Your Systems to Order LTS101 Engine Repairs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer, As part of our normal business process, Honeywell continually looks for ways to better serve customers more efficiently and cost-effectively. After an extensive evaluation, we have decided to move all repair and overhaul operations from our Greer, South Carolina facility. The transition which includes the LTS101 engine product line is expected to be complete later this summer. Moving forward, repair and overhaul services for the LTS101 engine product line will be provided by our authorized channel partners: Intermountain Turbine Services and Airwork. Honeywell remains committed to the LTS101 engine product line and we plan to continue to support repair and overhaul on LTS101 engines through our channel partner network for many years. This information only affects aftermarket repair and overhaul services. There are no planned changes to the production line. A review of past orders indicates that you have placed production or repair orders for impacted <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/LTS10_PartNumbers_Feb2019.pdf]]>LTS101 engine <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/LTS10_PartNumbers_Feb2019.pdf]]>part numbers <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/LTS10_PartNumbers_Feb2019.pdf]]>. To minimize issues or delays, please follow these guidelines and actions:
Original Equipment Orders: There is no change to placing original equipment orders.
Engine Component Repair Orders:
- At this time, there is no change to engine component repair orders. - Later in the transition, we will provide specific direction about the component repair location.
New Engine Repair Orders:
- Effective immediately, all LTS101 engine repair orders should be placed with one of the Honeywell Authorized Service Centers identified below. - Airwork and Intermountain Turbine Services are currently authorized to perform these repairs. - This notice is for engine repairs only. - For real-time questions about where to send your repairs, please access the MyAerospace <http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com> Repair Site Capability list.
Existing Engine Repair Orders: Honeywell will make every effort to fulfill orders that are already in process with no impact to you. If an issue arises that prevents this, we will work closely with all parties to coordinate the repair completion.
Update your Authorized Supplier List and Internal Systems Please update your authorized supplier list and internal systems to include the new supplier information for this equipment.
